CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in these data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter room . MOT is holding CHI's hand until he immediately goes to the toys on the floor .
INV explains warm-up task to MOT while CHI plays with the toys on the floor
CHI is on the floor playing with the jack+in+the+box .
MOT turns to see what CHI is pointing to
CHI picks up the ball and throws it backwards over his right shoulder
CHI reaches out and grabs the book on the floor
<aft> MOT sits in the chair near door
CHI walks over to MOT with the book
<bef> MOT picks up CHI and puts him on her lap
MOT points to the first page
MOT points to picture of kitten
CHI looks where MOT is pointing
MOT points to picture of lion
MOT turns to the next page .
CHI points to the right hand page
MOT points to the left hand page
CHI looks where MOT is pointing
MOT points to the next page
CHI points to the next page
<aft> CHI starts to turn the page
<aft> MOT points to left hand page
CHI points to right hand page
MOT points to picture of kitten
<aft> CHI points to the right hand page
MOT points to picture of kitten on left hand page again
CHI points to the left hand page
CHI tries to close the book
MOT pulls the book away from CHI and holds it open
CHI has almost closed the book and is looking at the cover .
CHI gets off of MOT's lap
<bef> CHI walks across the room with book and stops to watch the camera
CHI points at the camera and smiles
MOT is not in camera view
CHI turns towards MOT and then back towards the camera
CHI lowers his head and looks at the floor
CHI puts the book on the floor and points to cushion of chair
CHI walks around the chair and pulls it out and starts to climb into it
CHI turns to look at MOT
CHI gets out of the chair and walks over by the door
<bef> CHI looks up at the wall . CHI points upwards to the wall
CHI points to something on the wall over the desk
MOT looks up at the wall
MOT goes out of camera view again
CHI continues to point at the overhead light
CHI points to a different light
CHI points to a different light
CHI points to the same thing on the wall as he glances at MOT briefly
CHI walks over and points to a mirror on the wall which he can reach as he looks at MOT
CHI turns and tries to look in the mirror
CHI tries to climb into a chair near the mirror
MOT holds CHI directly in front of the mirror
CHI tries to get down as MOT puts him on the floor
<aft> CHI starts moving the chair at the table
MOT sits in the chair near the door .
CHI walks between the chair and the table
CHI gets up and throws the toy football across the floor
CHI throws the ball at MOT
CHI crouches near the chair in a playful way
<aft> MOT holds out the ball toward CHI
<aft> MOT throws the ball across the room
MOT goes out of camera view again
CHI starts playing with the toy car on the floor
CHI picks up the car and looks up at MOT
CHI puts the car on the floor and plays with it
CHI starts to play with the jack+in+the+box and holds it up in front of MOT
CHI puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI lets go of the jack+in+the+box and it falls over
INV enters the room . INV leaves the room while small scale activity takes place and reenters at 10:16:21
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV puts the toys on the table away but leaves the brush for the CHI to hold on to
CHI picks up the brush and puts it in his mouth
MOT talks to INV about interview questions
CHI puts the toy in his mouth so MOT takes it away from him at first
<$=1> MOT takes the brush toy away from CHI
MOT holds brush toy out to MOT
INV places the object on the table
CHI immediately touches the object on the table
INV moves the object closer to herself
CHI looks up at the object
MOT tries to give the toy brush back to CHI
INV sets the object in motion
CHI stares at the object and smiles
MOT is still holding the toy
CHI sits for about four seconds and then reaches for the object
<$=2> MOT tries to hold back CHI
CHI swings at object with his hand and knocks it over
INV holds the object on the table
MOT is holding CHI's hand down
CHI tries to touch the object again
MOT holds CHI' s hand down again
CHI sits back and pulls his hand away from MOT
MOT places her hand on CHI's arm
CHI pulls his hand back again and tries to reach the object again
INV explains to MOT about the four Parent Child Interaction boxes . CHI gets out of the chair and MOT is holding him . INV takes the brush toy
MOT puts CHI down on floor
MOT walks over to the desk
CHI follows MOT to the desk
MOT picks up the box containing the ball
MOT sits in chair by door and holds ball out to CHI
MOT gets out of t he chair and sits on the floor
CHI drops the ball in front of MOT and sits on the floor in front of her
CHI takes the ball under his arm and slides himself backwards
the ball slips out of CHI's hold
CHI throws the ball bouncing it on the floor
MOT rolls it back to CHI
CHI flails arms and rolls ball between legs and then back to MOT
MOT holds the ball up to CHI
MOT pulls CHI's arm gently to restrain him
MOT bounces the ball on the floor .
CHI crawls over to the floor beside MOT
MOT still tries to pull CHI back
CHI looks over at the ball
MOT continues to hold the ball
CHI grabs the ball and rolls over MOT onto the floor with it
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles
CHI turns to face MOT with ball in his hands as if he is ready to throw it
MOT rolls the ball back to CHI
CHI rolls ball back to MOT
MOT throws the ball back to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
<aft> MOT rolls the ball across the room
CHI crawls across the floor and gets the ball
MOT still has hands out and she moves them up into the air
the ball hits MOT in foot and bounces back towards CHI
CHI rolls the ball back to MOT
CHI picks up the box that had the ball in it
CHI throws the box towards MOT
MOT moves box in front of her and throws the ball in it
CHI rushes over to the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box and throws it to MOT
MOT catches the ball . <aft> MOT throws it in the box again
CHI stands up and takes the ball out of the box . Then CHI throws the ball in the box
CHI takes ball and drops it into the box again
CHI takes ball and aims for box
the ball hits MOT in the leg
CHI picks up the ball and tries to get it in the box again and misses again
MOT catches the ball and throws it back in the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box and throws it at MOT
CHI picks up the box and holds it over his head as he walks towards MOT
MOT raises her hand to protect herself
<bef> CHI rushes at MOT with box . <aft> CHI falls to floor
<bef> MOT grabs the box . MOT moves the box to one side
MOT rolls the ball across the floor
CHI reaches out towards the box
<bef> CHI picks up box and swings it at MOT
CHI falls to MOT's lap in a fit of laughter
MOT moves box to one side
MOT points to the ball across the room
CHI moves into a crawling position but then sits in front of MOT
<bef> CHI looks at MOT and then around the room
CHI crawls quickly and enthusiastically across the room and gets the ball and holds it
<aft> CHI looks at MOT and smiles
CHI looks up at the mirror on the wall then at MOT
CHI sits motionless holding ball up as if he is going to throw it
<aft> MOT gets box and puts it in front of her
the ball bounces off of the box and rolls under the table
<$=4> MOT gets up and walks across room to get ball
CHI crawls across room and grabs the box
MOT walks around the table to try to get the ball
CHI gets off of floor and goes over to where MOT is
MOT and CHI are now both out of camera view
MOT moves away from the table with the ball
MOT puts ball in box and places it on the desk
CHI is trying to get at the computer in the corner of the room
MOT puts CHI down over near the door
MOT gets the second box of the desk
MOT and CHI sit on floor together
<$=2> MOT puts the box on the floor between her and CHI
<aft> MOT takes the cover off the box
CHI immediately goes to touch the contents of the box
takes the towel out of CHI's reach
MOT holds the cloth in front of her face
CHI buries his head in cloth on MOT's lap and then pulls at it with his teeth
MOT pulls cloth out of CHI's mouth
CHI sits still for a moment
CHI starts crawling away from MOT
CHI stands up and pushes on door
MOT holds cloth in front of her face again
MOT is still holding cloth in front of her face
CHI looks to MOT then to the door
MOT still has cloth held in front of her face
camera is focussed on CHI MOT is not in view
CHI is still trying to get out the door
MOT and CHI are referring to a telephone that is ringing outside the room somewhere
CHI looks intently at the computer in the corner
CHI walks over to the table
CHI runs around behind the table
MOT puts cloth back in the box and starts to get up
CHI is sitting on the floor playing with toy string of beads
MOT walks over to CHI and picks him up
MOT places CHI on the floor
CHI stands on the floor and plays with the beads
CHI looks down at the beads in his hands
MOT picks up the next box
MOT lowers the box so CHI can look in it
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI sits down next to MOT and reaches in the box
MOT takes the paper and the crayons out of the box
CHI tries to help MOT gets the paper and the crayons out and CHI gets one crayon
CHI watches MOT as he holds the crayon
<bef> MOT puts cover back on box and puts the paper and the crayons on top of the box
<aft> MOT puts the crayons down and taps the paper lightly
CHI turns the crayon around in his hand and then starts to draw
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles
CHI changes crayons and continues coloring
<aft> MOT looks behind her at clock
<bef> CHI changes crayons again . CHI continues to color
MOT pushes a crayon that was rolling on to the box
CHI changes crayons colors briefly , changes again uses new crayon for approximately one second then stops
CHI examines the end of the crayon
CHI starts to put all the crayons together on the side of the box
CHI colors for a moment and then stops and tries to get a new piece of paper out from underneath the one he just used
MOT lifts up the crayons and the paper and puts the picture the child just made at the bottom of the paper pile
CHI takes a crayon from MOT's hand
CHI moves the crayon around in his hands
CHI looks down at the crayons
MOT holds paper up in front of CHI and looks at CHI
MOT moves paper around in her hands and then puts it down
CHI puts all the crayons on the floor
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI grabs crayons with one hand and the beads with the other
MOT takes the beads away from CHI and puts them on the chair nearby
CHI holds the crayons with both hands
CHI motions towards the paper with all the crayons
MOT makes a fist as if she is holding all of the crayons
MOT looks at CHI and leans forward
CHI puts down a crayon on the paper
MOT holds the paper for CHI
CHI puts all the crayons down on the paper except one which he begins to color with . CHI colors for approximately three seconds and then sits back
<aft> MOT picks up a crayon and taps it on the paper twice
End of PCI Crayons and Paper
CHI takes the same crayon MOT had and bangs it on the paper five times . CHI then throws two of the crayons on the other side of the box and crawls after them
MOT picks up the crayons and paper
CHI picks up a crayon and crawls behind the table
CHI goes out of camera view
MOT takes the cover off of the box
CHI stops crawling and turns towards MOT
<bef >points to a crayon that is on the floor near CHI
CHI picks up one crayon with each hand and puts them in the box
MOT puts the cover back on the box
CHI hits the box with his hand
MOT gets up and walks over to desk
CHI walks over to the desk with MOT
<bef> CHI reaches for the last box
MOT starts to uncover the box
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT lowers the box with the book in it
MOT puts the cover back on the box
CHI is staring at the cover of the book
MOT puts the empty box on the desk and sits on the floor next to CHI
MOT takes CHI on her lap
CHI sits quietly with the book in his hands
MOT takes the book and shows CHI the cover . then MOT opens the book
MOT points and runs her finger over the pages
CHI sits quietly focussing on the book
MOT points to each animal as she says their name
CHI follows MOT's finger with his eyes
MOT points to the page with the calf on it and then to the donkey
CHI sits unmoving still fixed on book
CHI sits motionless and stares at the book
MOT points to the next page
MOT runs her finger over the text as she reads it
MOT points to the next page
CHI is still pointing at the page
MOT points to the next page
CHI tries to turn the page
CHI helps MOT turn the page
MOT turns the book over in her hands
MOT opens the front cover of the book
CHI sits quietly in MOT's lap
CHI looks at the other page
CHI turns the pages of the book
MOT is referring to the fact that they skipped a few pages in the book so the should go back
CHI pulls on the strap of MOTs watch
MOT points to the page with her thumb
CHI runs finger up and down the top part of the page
MOT points further down on page
CHI points to the next page
MOT points to the page and looks at CHI
MOT leans close to CHI's ear
CHI puts his hand on the chair nearby
CHI turns around towards the door
End of PCI - Book . INV enters the room
